text: ان الذين هم من خشية ربهم مشفقون

translations.translation: Those who are filled with the fear of their Lord,
Surely those who live in awe of their Lord,
Surely those who stand in awe for fear of their Lord,
Only those who are, out of fear of Him, humble before their Lord,
Indeed those who are overwhelmed due to the fear of their Lord –
Verily, those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
Surely they who from fear of their Lord are cautious,
Surely those who tremble in fear of their Lord
Lo! those who go in awe for fear of their Lord.
Those who tremble with fear of their Lord;
Verily those who for fear of their Lord are in awe.
Indeed those who are apprehensive for the fear of their Lord,
Verily those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
Verily! Those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
Those who tremble in fear of their Lord,
Those who, from awe of their Lord, are fearful.
Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
[23:57] Surely those who, for fear of their Lord, are apprehensive, are fearful of His chastisement,

Then Allah clarified to whom He hastens with good things in the life of this world, saying: (Lo! those who go in awe for fear of their Lord) of their Lord's chastisement; for these We hasten with good things;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم قال سبحانه: { إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيةِ رَبِّهِمْ مُّشْفِقُونَ } [المؤمنون: 57] خائفون حذرون متحرزون

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
قال في الحاشية: لمّا ذكر تعالى غفلةَ الكفار ووعيدهم
 عقَّب ذلك بوصف المؤمنين بضد ذلك ويقينهم بالرُّجْعَى
 وإشفاقهم من جلال الحق وقهره
هـ
 يقول الحق جل جلاله: { إن الذين هم من خشية ربهم مشفقون } أي: من عذابه خائفون حذرون
